page.title: 03PIGGERY FARM,WATERLANE.
page.content: The farmer has farmed for nearly 40 years.He has{35 acres}of grass land,on which he grazes the{cattle,}some land he rents.He is the only worker so if ill,he has to call emergency staff. He has{23 beef cattle,}and in the winter about 60.He feeds the cattle hay in winter,nuts and barley in summer.He sells at 18 months. He has{500 pigs, at birth they weigh 3 lb.At 5 months they weigh 175 lb, they put on 10lb every week.At that age they go to be slaughtered for pork and bacon, Landrace pigs are used.He has this breed because they put on weight quicker.The farmer sells{20 pigs}a week.The pigs live in sheds, when the {sows}are pregnant,they are put into a field.The pigs are feed according to their size,the{piglets}eat small pellets and the{sows}chunk pellets,he also gives powdered milk.
